screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Google Translate app's search results page. The user has entered "google translate" into the search bar, with suggested search terms appearing below. These suggestions include terms like "keyboard," "free app," and "photo." The search results are displayed with arrows pointing to the right, indicating options for further exploration.
history_actions: click on the "Google Chrome" app located at the lower left.
click on the search icon (typically a magnifier) located at the top-right corner of the screen.
click on the search clear icon (indicated by an "X") located at the top right.

think.Thought: The user has requested to uninstall 'Google Translate,' but the current screen only shows the Google Translate app in the search results on Google Chrome. The next logical step is to open the app's details page on the device, where the uninstall option is available. I should navigate to the app's details page to proceed with uninstallation.
Future Action Plan: Tap on the 'Google Translate' app icon in the search results to open its app details page.
